configuration_setting.description: DEPRECATED (Use -Dep.search.replica.url and -Dep.search.primary.url system properties) The search server's URL. If this is not set correctly, searching and browsing in the Cortex and in Commerce Manager will not work. For a search server cluster, this setting must contain two values. The default value must be set to the load balancer URL. A defined value with the context set to 'master' must be set to the master search server URL.
DEPRECATED (Use -Dep.asset.location system property) The path to the directory that contains assets required by the application, including images, theme files, and digital goods.
DEPRECATED (Use -Dep.smtp.host system property) The host name of the email server.
DEPRECATED (Use -Dep.smtp.port system property) The listener port of the email server.

WARNING (Can be overridden at runtime with -Dep.changesets.enabled system property) Determines whether change sets are enabled. When set to true, CM users can add objects to a change set to prevent others from editing them. Setting this to false will disable the feature.
